mapper.select: SELECT * FROM SYS_AUTHORITIES WHERE AUTHORITY_ID IN ( SELECT DISTINCT AUTHORITY_ID FROM SYS_ROLES_AUTHORITIES S1 JOIN sys_users_roles ur ON S1.ROLE_ID = ur.tab_id JOIN Tab_user_info inf ON inf.id = ur.tab_id AND inf.username = #{username} )
SELECT auth.*, modul.MODULE_NAME FROM SYS_AUTHORITIES auth LEFT JOIN sys_modules modul ON modul.MODULE_ID = auth.MODULE_ID WHERE auth.AUTHORITY_MARK LIKE #{name} or auth.AUTHORITY_NAME LIKE #{name}
SELECT RESOURCE_ID from sys_authorities_resources where AUTHORITY_ID = #{id}
